thread.title: Rwanda: Century Announces Name Change to FirstContinent
thread.title_full: Rwanda: Century Announces Name Change to FirstContinent

title: Rwanda: Century Announces Name Change to FirstContinent
text:
Angola: Angola - Visas Deemed Barriers to Private Investment - Jurist 
As part of the transformation and to reflect the new corporate identity, the company is thrilled to announce its rebranding from Century to FirstContinent Group Ltd ("FirstContinent"). Nima Yussuf, a partner and senior representative of the group who previously worked for Goldmans Sachs in London, stated that "FirstContinent is a direct reference to the African Continent and the company's commitment to being a vehicule for transformative development". Africa has been the core and sole focus of the company since it was founded in early 2012. FirstContinent will continue to be a long-term investor in Africa's strategic sectors; helping build a better Africa with the valuable trust of first class clients and investors. 
In addition, the firm attracted new executive talent, new investors and retired members of the founding team to non-executive roles. We invite you to visit our new website at www.firstcontinentgroup.com to find out more about FirstContinent. Rwanda
